main event: A man saw a dark, silver circular object flash and disappear behind trees in an industrial area in Springfield, Ohio in 1964.
interesting points: The object was observed for only 10 seconds.
The object made no sound and moved in a horizontal path.
The object appeared to be larger than the size of a match head held at arm's length.
The witness estimated the object was about 1/2 mile away.
The witness reported the object as a dark, silver circular object with a green halo.
